name: III-ad
description:
Brave the ocean and try to find your home !
III-ad is a bullet hell inspired by the Iliad

This game was created during the Global Game Jam 2019.

Development
Samy Vera : https://github.com/5amyVera/
Matteo Lecuit : https://github.com/matteolecuit

Graphic design
